title: Innocent Witness: Aleppo's Devastation as Seen by Its Children - NBC News

organizations.name: nbc news for one syrian refugee family

text:
For One Syrian Refugee Family, U.S. is Last Resort for Ill Daughter 2:09 autoplay autoplay Copy this code to your website or blog <iframe src="http://www.nbcnews.com/widget/video-embed/769743939965" width="560" height="315" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe> 
NBC News first met the Kiwan family in Jordan where they were refugees from the war in neighboring Syria. Today, the family lives in Marietta, Georgia, where daughter Hala will soon begin a series of life-saving heart operations. Play
